name: Last Healer
description:
World is not fair.

Balance is a delicate matter.

When the sky was stained with blood, and the birds singing gave way to sobs, Aeri fell. A handful of survivors took refuge in the roots of the Holy Tree, and you are among them.

Sweet, little high priestess ... It's time to use your powers for something more than a splinter treatment.

Your best friends will help you: the sorceress Ravenna and the warrior Avis. They will help clear your way, and you will help them survive.

Save the life of your friends. Get to the core of the temple. Cleanse him from evil, and everything will return to square one.

Before it's too late.
